mapper.select: SELECT gift_id, member_id, to_mem_email, to_mem_name, message, gift_price, pay_method, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as r_date FROM gift WHERE gift_id=#{gift_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE gift SET member_id=#{member_id}, to_mem_email=#{to_mem_email}, to_mem_name=#{to_mem_name}, message=#{message}, gift_price=#{gift_price} WHERE gift_id=#{gift_id}
